Section.name: About Sri Venkateswara Vedic University
Section.description:
Sri Venkateswara Vedic University was started in the year 2006 under the efforts of Shri Rameshwar Thakurji. University aims that research and publication department can significantly contribute and bring out such works that serve in the need. University has 147.65 acres of land in Tirupati. University is recongnosed by UGC.
